problem_text: Ailton Silva, born in 1995, is commonly known as Ailton. Ailton is a football player who was loaned out to Braga. Ailton Silva is a Brazillian footballer who plays for Nautico. Nautico is a football club along with Braga. Fluminense is a football club.
predicates:
BornIn(x, y) ::: x was born in year y.
KnownAs(x, y) ::: x is commonly known as y.
FootballPlayer(x) ::: x is a football player.
LoanedTo(x, y) ::: x was loaned out to y.
Brazilian(x) ::: x is a Brazillian person.
PlaysFor(x, y) ::: x plays for y.
FootballClub(x) ::: x is a football club.

tests.questions: Based on the above information, is the following statement true or false? Ailton Silva, who was born in 1995, plays for both Braga and Nautico.
tests.conclusions: ∃x ∃y ∃z (KnownAs(x, y) ∧ BornIn(x, 1995) ∧ FootballPlayer(x) ∧ LoanedTo(x, z) ∧ PlaysFor(x, z)) ::: Ailton Silva, who was born in 1995, plays for both Braga and Nautico. FALSE

tests.questions: Based on the above information, is the following statement true or false? Ailton Silva is a Brazilian football player who plays for Braga and was born in 1995.
tests.conclusions: Brazilian(ailton) ∧ FootballPlayer(ailton) ∧ PlaysFor(ailton, braga) ∧ BornIn(ailton, year1995) ::: FALSE

tests.questions: Based on the above information, is the following statement true or false? Ailton, a football player born in 1995, is Brazilian and plays for Braga, and was loaned to Nautico.
tests.conclusions: Brazilian(ailton) ∧ PlaysFor(ailton, braga) ∧ LoanedTo(ailton, nautico) ∧ BornIn(ailton, 1995) ∧ FootballPlayer(ailton) ::: Ailton, a football player born in 1995, is Brazilian and plays for Braga, and was loaned to Nautico. FALSE

tests.questions: Based on the above information, is the following statement true or false? Ailton Silva, who is commonly known as Ailton, is a Brazilian football player who plays for Braga.
tests.conclusions: Brazilian(ailton) ∧ FootballPlayer(ailton) ∧ PlaysFor(ailton, braga) ∧ KnownAs(ailton, ailton) ::: Ailton Silva, who is commonly known as Ailton, is a Brazilian football player who plays for Braga. TRUE

tests.questions: Based on the above information, is the following statement true or false? Ailton Silva, a Brazilian football player born in 1995 and commonly known as Ailton, was loaned out to Braga and plays for Nautico.
tests.conclusions: PlaysFor(ailton, braga) ∧ LoanedTo(ailton, nautico) ::: Ailton Silva plays for Braga and was loaned out to Nautico. FALSE

tests.questions: Based on the above information, is the following statement true or false? Ailton Silva, born in 1995 and commonly known as Ailton, plays for Fluminense.
tests.conclusions: PlaysFor(ailton, fluminense) ::: Ailton Silva plays for Fluminense. FALSE

tests.questions: Based on the above information, is the following statement true or false? Ailton Silva, a Brazilian football player born in 1995 and commonly known as Ailton, was loaned out to Braga, and Braga is a football club.
tests.conclusions: LoanedTo(ailton, braga) ∧ FootballClub(braga) ::: Ailton Silva was loaned out to Braga, and Braga is a football club. TRUE

tests.questions: Based on the above information, is the following statement true or false? Ailton Silva, who was born in 1995 and is commonly known as Ailton, is a Brazilian football player and was loaned out to Braga, and he plays for Nautico.
tests.conclusions: FootballPlayer(ailton) ∧ Brazilian(ailton) ∧ LoanedTo(ailton, braga) ∧ PlaysFor(ailton, nautico) ∧ BornIn(ailton, 1995) ∧ KnownAs(ailton, ailton) ∧ FootballClub(braga) ∧ FootballClub(nautico) ::: TRUE

tests.questions: Based on the above information, is the following statement true or false? Ailton Silva, a Brazilian football player born in 1995 and commonly known as Ailton, plays for Nautico, and Braga is a football club.
tests.conclusions: PlaysFor(ailton, nautico) ∧ FootballClub(braga) ::: Ailton Silva, a Brazilian football player born in 1995 and commonly known as Ailton, plays for Nautico, and Braga is a football club. TRUE

tests.questions: Based on the above information, is the following statement true or false? Ailton Silva, a Brazilian football player born in 1995 and commonly known as Ailton, was loaned out to Braga and also plays for Nautico, and Braga is a football club.

validation.questions: Based on the above information, is the following statement true, false, or uncertain? No one playing for Nautico is Brazilian.
validation.conclusions: ¬∃x (PlaysFor(x, nautico) ∧ Brazilian(x)) ::: No one playing for Nautico is Brazilian. false
